listitem.para: Outputs the file position of the current write stream file as a number. An output value of 0 means that the write position is at the beginning of the stream.

note.para: The output is stored in a list and displayed when the writer is returned to screen ([]).

listitem.programlisting: OPENWRITE "dummy.fil SETWRITE "dummy.fil MAKE "history [] MAKE "history LPUT WRITEPOS :history PRINT "Hello MAKE "history LPUT WRITEPOS :history PRINT [Good Bye] MAKE "history LPUT WRITEPOS :history SETWRITE [] CLOSE "dummy.fil SHOW :history [0 7 17]
